programme.desc: A psychologist finds herself drawn to a mysterious murder suspect who claims to possess godlike powers.

programme.desc: Two kids with special abilities must find a girl in Hong Kong before a shadowy government organization does.

programme.desc: An ex-con and his adopted brother go on the run with a weapon of mysterious origin as their only protection.

programme.desc: After an alien invasion, an unlikely recruit commands Earth's forces and fights for the future of humanity.

programme.title: Source Code
programme.desc: An army pilot must travel through time using the 'Source Code' in order to identify a ruthless bomber.

programme.desc: Strangers awaken aboard an alien spacecraft. Divided they'll die. Together, they can find a way to stay alive.

programme.desc: An FBI agent and Florida State officer team up to investigate a string of unsolved murder cases.

programme.title: Alice, Darling
programme.desc: A woman's identity and friendships are tested as she breaks free from her psychologically abusive boyfriend.

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke and Emma Watson star in this thriller about a small town crime that unmasks a horrifying mystery.
